data.partBlankContent: When safe mode is used, a computer will only start with the minimum number of system files needed for it to work properly. data.fullContent: When safe mode is used, a computer will only start with the minimum number of system files needed for it to work properly. This is to make it easier to find a problem that may be causing a computer to work incorrectly. The screen resolution is also smaller and there is no sound or internet connection in safe mode. This is because these features are not necessary for the computer to work properly.
data.answer: 当使用安全模式时，计算机将只启动正常工作所需的最小系统文件数。这是为了更容易地找到可能导致计算机工作不正确的问题。屏幕分辨率也更小，在安全模式下没有声音或互联网连接。这是因为这些功能并不是计算机正常工作所必需的。
